tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE self_driving_car_fleet_maintenance (
  car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  next_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  repair_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    mechanic_id INT,
    cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE repair_history (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_type VARCHAR(50),
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE car_information (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    current_mileage INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY, car_id INT, maintenance_type VARCHAR(255), schedule_date TIMESTAMP, completed BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (id INT PRIMARY KEY, car_id INT, maintenance_type VARCHAR(255), completion_date TIMESTAMP, technician VARCHAR(255), cost DECIMAL(10, 2))
CREATE TABLE repair_schedule (id INT PRIMARY KEY, car_id INT, repair_type VARCHAR(255), schedule_date TIMESTAMP, completed BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE repair_history (id INT PRIMARY KEY, car_id INT, repair_type VARCHAR(255), completion_date TIMESTAMP, technician VARCHAR(255), cost DECIMAL(10, 2))

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule ( 
   schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
   vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, 
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL, 
   mechanic_name VARCHAR(255) 
 );

CREATE TABLE repair_history ( 
   repair_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
   vehicle_id INT NOT NULL, 
   repair_date DATE NOT NULL, 
   repair_description TEXT, 
   repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) 
 );
